description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Tagine recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tagine,Orange,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Stone fruit,High protein,Soy free,Rice,Slow cooker,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lamb Tagine Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup long grain white rice, steamed (to serve)
1 large orange, juiced and rind finely grated
1kg butterflied lamb shoulder Rosemary & mint, diced

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour and spices into a large snap-lock bag. Seal and shake to combine. Add lamb, reseal and shake until lamb is coated.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat until hot. Add lamb, in batches, and cook for 8 minutes or until browned. Transfer to slow cooker.
Add onion to frying pan and cook for 4 minutes or until soft. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Sprinkle any remaining flour over onion mixture and stir until combined.
Cook for 1 minute. Slowly add stock and orange rind and juice to pan, stirring constantly until well combined and mixture comes to the boil. Pour over lamb in slow cooker.
Cover and cook on LOW setting for 6 hours.
Add apricots and chickpeas. Change the cooker setting to HIGH and cook for 20 minutes. Serve lamb tagine with rice and garnish with parsley.
